trans-unit.source: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.
trans-unit.target: 提供與目前應用程式相關的屬性、方法和事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL.
trans-unit.target: 所公開的屬性`My.Application`物件只與目前的應用程式或 DLL 相關聯的傳回資料。

trans-unit.source: No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `My.Application` 無法改變任何系統層級資訊。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes:
<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase> provides members that are available in all projects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase> 提供適用於所有專案的成員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase> 提供可用在 Windows Form 應用程式中的成員。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> provides members that are available in console applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ConsoleApplicationBase> 提供主控台應用程式中可用的成員。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if this value is available.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法來取得並顯示路徑環境變數的值，這個值是否可用。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it displays a message that indicates that the PATH environment variable does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會顯示一個訊息，指出 PATH 環境變數不存在。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Name of the culture as a string.
trans-unit.target: 做為字串的文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible names, see <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能名稱的清單，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the culture used by the current thread for string manipulation and for string formatting.
trans-unit.target: 變更目前執行緒用於字串操作和字串格式化的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method changes the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法會變更目前的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, numbers, sorting order of text, string comparisons, and casing for all computations on that thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> 決定的預設格式的日期、 時間、 貨幣、 數字、 文字及字串比較，請在該執行緒上的所有計算的大小寫的排序。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.Culture%2A> property or the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前的文化特性，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.Culture%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: 它包含與標準設定地理區域相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property can only be set to a specific culture or to the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性只能設定，以特定文化特性或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用`My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法，以變更目前的執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread> set.
Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads.
trans-unit.target: 操作執行緒有危險，因為與執行緒相關聯的安全性狀態。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this permission should be given only as necessary to trustworthy code.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您應該此權限指定為必要時，才可信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change a thread's culture in semi-trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更非完全信任的程式碼中的執行緒的文化特性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how changing the culture changes the string representation of dates.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範如何變更文化特性變更日期的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cultureName" /> is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cultureName" /> 不是有效的文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Name of the culture as a string.
trans-unit.target: 做為字串的文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible names, see <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能名稱的清單，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: 變更目前執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method changes the current thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法會變更目前的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object; it uses this information to look up culture-specific resources at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>屬性會決定使用資源管理員的文化特性和`My.Resources`物件; 它會使用此資訊在執行階段查詢特定文化特性的資源。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the current UI culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.UICulture%2A> property or the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取目前 UI 文化特性，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.UICulture%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: 使用`My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法，以變更目前的執行緒會使用字串操作和字串格式的文化特性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to set the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法來設定文化特性`My.Resources`物件用來擷取資源。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`.
trans-unit.target: 要讓範例能夠運作，您的應用程式必須具有名為字串`Message`中應用程式的資源檔和應用程式不能有法文文化特性的資源檔案版本， `Resources.fr-FR.resx`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 加入或移除資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。

trans-unit.source: If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式並沒有資源檔，法文文化特性版本`My.Resources`物件會從預設文化特性資源檔擷取資源。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cultureName" /> is not a valid culture name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cultureName" /> 不是有效的文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前執行緒用於字串 (String) 操作和字串格式化的文化特性 (Culture)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，表示目前執行緒用於字串操作和字串格式化的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property gets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.CurrentCulture`屬性會取得<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>目前的執行緒用來操作字串和字串格式化的物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is identical to the one returned by the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property, which controls many of the string-related computations on that thread.
trans-unit.target: 此物件是等同所傳回<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>控制許多字串相關計算該執行緒上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, and numbers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性決定的預設格式的日期、 時間、 貨幣和數字。

trans-unit.source: It also determines how to sort, compare, and capitalize strings.
trans-unit.target: 它也會決定如何排序、 比較和大寫的字串。

trans-unit.source: To change the culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeCulture%2A> method or assign a different <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更文化特性，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeCulture%2A>方法或指派不同的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: 它包含與標準設定地理區域相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用`My.Application.CurrentUICulture`屬性來取得目前的執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源的文化特性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how the culture affects the string representation of dates.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範文化特性如何影響日期的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the name of the environment variable.
Returns the value of the specified environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定環境變數的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the value of the environment variable with the name <paramref name="name" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" /> 包含具有名為 <paramref name="name" /> 的環境變數值。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method returns the environment variable with the name `name`.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法會傳回名稱的環境變數`name`。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to <xref:System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, except that this method raises an exception if the environment variable specified by `name` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是類似於<xref:System.Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不過，這個方法會引發例外狀況，如果環境變數所指定`name`不存在。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if available.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法來取得並顯示路徑環境變數的值，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it displays a message indicating that the PATH environment variable does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會顯示訊息，指出 PATH 環境變數不存在。

trans-unit.source: The environment variable specified by <paramref name="name" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 所指定的環境變數不存在。

trans-unit.source: The calling code does not have <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission" /> with <see langword="Read" /> access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫程式碼沒有 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission" /> 與 <see langword="Read" /> 存取權。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties for getting information about the application's assembly, such as the version number, description, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供用於取得應用程式組件之相關資訊 (例如版本號碼、描述等) 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo" /> object for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AssemblyInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.Info.Version`屬性來顯示應用程式的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，提供用於將事件和例外狀況 (Exception) 資訊寫入應用程式記錄檔接聽程式的屬性和方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log" /> object for the current application.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法寫入追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 寫入記錄檔訊息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，表示目前執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property gets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.CurrentUICulture`屬性會取得<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件目前的執行緒用來擷取特定文化特性資源。

trans-unit.source: This object is identical to the one returned by the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object, information it needs to look up culture-specific resources at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>屬性會決定使用資源管理員的文化特性和`My.Resources`物件，在執行階段查詢特定文化特性資源所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: To change the culture, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A> method or assign a different <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更文化特性，您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A>方法或指派不同的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>物件<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> setting is different from a language setting.
It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: 它包含與標準設定地理區域相關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.
trans-unit.target: 使用`My.Application.CurrentCulture`屬性來取得目前的執行緒會使用字串操作和字串格式的文化特性。
Windows Form 控制項程式庫

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to cache the current culture before changing it by using <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Application.CurrentCulture`之前變更使用快取目前的文化特性屬性<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.ApplicationBase.ChangeUICulture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method sets the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources.
trans-unit.target: `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法設定的文化特性的`My.Resources`物件用來擷取資源。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`.
trans-unit.target: 要讓範例能夠運作，您的應用程式必須具有名為字串`Message`中應用程式的資源檔和應用程式不能有法文文化特性的資源檔案版本， `Resources.fr-FR.resx`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 加入或移除資源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。

trans-unit.source: If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式並沒有資源檔，法文文化特性版本`My.Resources`物件會從預設文化特性資源檔擷取資源。
